title: matha bavani
sahitya: mAtA bhavAnI shivE shankarI (jagan)nidAsuDanu kAvavE kaumArI (jagan mAta)   anupallavi  sadAnanda lahari kalgincinasudArNava priyE cAmuNdeshwari (mAtA)   caraNamunnada sArubhya pradAyinikannaDa sAmrAjya nilayE sadayEennaDu nI mahima vini pulakincinadhanyuDanucu, nanu nayamuga pAlincu (mAtA)
